New Records: Victor Wembanyama recorded his first 20-20 game of the season, and third in his short career
Key Match Events: Denver dominated the overtime period, holding San Antonio scoreless until 2:11 left in overtime (a 7-0 run)
Peyton Watson's two free throws brought the game to a tie with a little more than two minutes left to play
Nikola Jokic's successful free throw extended the Nuggets' lead to 108-106 with less than a minute to play
Devin Vassell missed a two-pointer on the ensuing possession, but recovered his own rebound and put-back to send the game into overtime tied 108-108
Post-Match Reflections: San Antonio Spurs star Victor Wembanyama won't be able to celebrate a win on his birthday after the Nuggets' fourth quarter comeback Saturday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Spurs' bench as a whole outscored the Nuggets' bench, 43-18
Others: San Antonio will have just one day off before traveling to Chicago for a Monday night game against the Bulls
